tool_description: Processes raw genomic data files including FASTQ, VCF, and expression matrices to generate cleaned, normalized datasets ready for downstream target discovery analysis.

input_file_path.description: Path to input genomic data file

data_type.description: Type of genomic data: FASTQ, VCF, expression_matrix, or proteomics

reference_genome.description: Reference genome version for alignment and annotation

normalization_method.description: Normalization method for expression data: TPM, RPKM, or DESeq2

remove_batch_effects.description: Whether to apply batch effect correction

error_messages: File not found: The specified input file path does not exist or is inaccessible.
Unsupported data type: Use one of [FASTQ, VCF, expression_matrix, proteomics].
Invalid reference genome: Supported versions are GRCh38, GRCh37, and mm10.
Quality threshold out of range: Must be between 0-40 for sequencing data.
Normalization method error: Use TPM, RPKM, or DESeq2 for expression data normalization.
Corrupted input file: File format is invalid or corrupted, cannot be processed.
usage: Specify input_file_path and data_type. Configure reference_genome, quality_threshold, and normalization_method as needed. Tool outputs processed, analysis-ready genomic datasets.

processed_file_path.description: Path to the processed output file

total_features.description: Number of genes/variants/proteins in processed dataset

samples_count.description: Number of samples in the dataset

processing_summary.description: Summary of processing steps and quality metrics
